content: धर {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (रा|री|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [धृ-अच्] (Usually at the end of <ab>comp.</ab>) Holding, carrying, bearing, wearing, containing, possessing, endowed with, preserving, observing, &c.; as in अक्षधर, अंशुधर, गदाधर, गंगाधर, महीधर, असृग्धर, दिव्यांबरधर, &c. --रः {@--1@} A mountain; उत्कं धरं द्रष्टुमवेक्ष्य शौरिमुत्कंधरं दारुक इत्युवाच <ls>Śi. 4. 18.</ls> {@--2@} A flock of cotton. {@--3@} A frivolous or dissolute man (विट). {@--4@} The king of the tortoises, {%<ab>i. e.</ab>%} Viṣṇu in his Kūrma incarnation. {@--5@} <ab>N.</ab> of one of the Vasus.
